description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.0JZU0FVnvAJ08fVR]{Paradigm Shift}

As a move action, you teleport up to 10 feet, extracting yourself from any impediments. If you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nFBcsp5FS1Wi46Fc]{Entangled}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.4AkWDHGM6gHDepHN]{Grappled}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.XgK4EdO5D3Fj3iWz]{Pinned}, these conditions end. If you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} and would move to a solid surface, you are now standing. If you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.QnGpBSHSTiszjPSb]{Off-Kilter} due to being in zero gravity, you right yourself. You must have line of sight to your destination. This movement doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity. After you use this ability, you can’t use it again for 1d6 rounds. You must know the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.szqNQWeHoDzlTFLU]{Flash Teleport (Su)} paradigm shift to learn this paradigm shift.
